title: 3 and Out - Packers Over Cards TNF Reaction, NFL Owners Reality Show, NFL Week 8 Preview, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Packers Over Cards TNF Reaction, NFL Owners Reality Show, NFL Week 8 Preview, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the shorthanded Packers handing the Cardinals their first loss of the season, and why the W shows how much better Green Bay is under Matt LaFleur than Mike McCarthy. Then, he examines the drama among the ownership ranks including the WFT email scandal and Stan Kroenke backtracking on a massive lawsuit payout promise, runs through some things to watch in the top Week 8 matchups, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
